person.persName: James Savage (Wayne County farmer and penitentiary inmate)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer. Wayne County native. Inmate in state penitentiary in Frankfort, Kentucky, in 1860. Sentenced in 1858 for manslaughter. Pardoned in 1863 by Thomas E. Bramlette.
